info.title: Vessel Schedule - sandbox
info.description: ZIM Point to Point Schedule with cutoff dates, vessel call sign and vessel lloyd's code

get.description:
**Query parameters include the following**

1.  ‘From Place’, ‘To Place’ (using valid UN Location code). The API will provide a list of direct or indirect routes, including transshipment ports.

2.  Each route has its own schedule and list of vessels;  each vessel is linked to each leg.
    
3.  If the selected ‘From’ and/or ‘To’ fields are inland locations, the leg will be defined as a Land Leg.

4.  Cut Off dates are available only for the first marine leg of each routes result

parameters.name: originCode
parameters.description: UN Location code of Origin Port (Maximum of 5 characters. First 2 represent Country code + 3 indicating location in that country)

parameters.name: destCode
parameters.description: UN Location code of Destination Port (Maximum of 5 characters. First 2 represent Country code + 3 indicating location in that country)

parameters.name: sortByDepartureOrArrival
parameters.description: Departure or Arrival Indicator (Only Departure or Arrival should be provided)

value.message: From Date cannot be larger than To Date
No Matching Marine routes found from origin_code to dest_code for the given date range
The Port code(s) origin_code and dest_code is marked Inactive in our system
The Port code(s) origin_code and dest_code is marked Restricted in our system
The Port code(s) origin_code and dest_code does not exist in our system

Arrival To Location UN Location code
